# fortitokencloud_domain (Resource)

## Example Usage
```terraform
resource "fortitokencloud_domain" "test" {
  name     = "hotmail.com"
  realm_id = data.fortitokencloud_realm.test.id
}
```

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `realm_id` (String)

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
